name: Mail Snail (Amanda Hackbardt)
description:
You are a customizable snail who is delivering snail mail to your fellow snails, making sure to deliver the right letters to the right snails. 

Along the way you will discover interactable secrets and find collectables which are proudly displayed inside your snail home. 

You travel across lands changing between your snail and shell forms, gliding along the terrain & sticking to certain surfaces. 

There are a few environmental stumbling blocks along the way but none that can hurt your little snail friend, as well as some simple machines to help you along your snail journey.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Instructions to play:

-Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move (also navigates menu screens)

-Spacebar to switch between shell and snail modes

-Press Enter or Left Shift to interact with interactable objects

-ESC to pause the game, also allows you to access options menu

-Press "C" to open the wardrobe and customize your snail

-Press TAB for a guide arrow and to display your current letters
